Package au.csiro.pathling.terminology.caching

Class CachingTerminologyService

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.utilities.ResourceCloser
au.csiro.pathling.terminology.BaseTerminologyService
au.csiro.pathling.terminology.caching.CachingTerminologyService
All Implemented Interfaces:
TerminologyService, Closeable, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
InMemoryCachingTerminologyService, PersistentCachingTerminologyService
public abstract class CachingTerminologyService extends BaseTerminologyService
A terminology service that uses embedded Infinispan to cache the results of the underlying terminology service operations.
Author:
John Grimes

    • CachingTerminologyService

      protected CachingTerminologyService(@Nonnull TerminologyClient terminologyClient, @Nonnull HttpClientCachingConfiguration configuration, @Nonnull Closeable... resourcesToClose)
      Parameters:
      terminologyClient - The terminology client to cache results from
      configuration - The caching configuration for the HTTP client
      resourcesToClose - Any resources that should be closed when this service is closed

  • Method Details

    • validateCode

      public boolean validateCode(@Nonnull String valueSetUrl, @Nonnull Coding coding)
      Description copied from interface: TerminologyService
      Validates that a coded value is in a value set. Abstracts the FHIR ValueSet/$validate-code operation.
      Parameters:
      valueSetUrl - the URL of the value set to validate against
      coding - the coding to test
      Returns:
      true if the coding is a valid member of the value set

    • translate

      @Nonnull public TranslationList translate(@Nonnull Coding coding, @Nonnull String conceptMapUrl, boolean reverse, @Nullable String target)
      Description copied from interface: TerminologyService
      Translates a code from one value set to another, based on the existing concept map. Abstracts the FHIR ConceptMap/$translate operation.
      Parameters:
      coding - the code to translate.
      conceptMapUrl - the url of the concept map to use for translation.
      reverse - if this is true, then the operation should return all the codes that might be mapped to this code.
      target - identifies the value set in which a translation is sought. If null all known translations are returned.
      Returns:
      the list of translations.

    • subsumes

      @Nonnull public ConceptSubsumptionOutcome subsumes(@Nonnull Coding codingA, @Nonnull Coding codingB)
      Description copied from interface: TerminologyService
      Tests the subsumption relationship between two codings given the semantics of subsumption in the underlying code system. Abstracts the CodeSystem/$subsumes operation.
      Parameters:
      codingA - the left code to be tested.
      codingB - the right code to be tested.
      Returns:
      ConceptSubsumptionOutcome representing the relation between codingA (left code) and codingB (right code).

    • lookup

      @Nonnull public PropertyOrDesignationList lookup(@Nonnull Coding coding, @Nullable String property, @Nullable String acceptLanguage)
      Description copied from interface: TerminologyService
      Gets additional details about the concept, including designations and properties. Abstracts the CodeSystem/$lookup operation.
      Parameters:
      coding - the coding to lookup.
      property - the code of the propertyCode to lookup. If not null only the properties with matching codes are returned.
      acceptLanguage - the preferred language for display and other localised properties.
      Returns:
      the list of properties and/or designations.

    • buildCacheManager

      protected abstract org.infinispan.manager.EmbeddedCacheManager buildCacheManager()
      Returns:
      a new EmbeddedCacheManager instance appropriate for the specific implementation

    • buildCache

      protected abstract <T extends Serializable> org.infinispan.Cache<Integer,TerminologyResult<T>> buildCache(@Nonnull org.infinispan.manager.EmbeddedCacheManager cacheManager, @Nonnull String cacheName, @Nonnull Class<T> valueType)
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the cache value
      Parameters:
      cacheManager - the EmbeddedCacheManager to use to construct the cache
      cacheName - a name for the cache
      valueType - the class of the cache value type
      Returns:
      a new Cache instance appropriate for the specific implementation
